title: "How can Quantum Psi improve communication and understanding through empathy and partecipation?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this text, the author explores various techniques of hypnomentalism, regression, and communication, using the principles of Quantum Psi(c) and Polyvagal Theory. The text covers the Spiegel Method, the Oculomotor Blockage, and the use of trance to help clients rediscover their inner strengths. The text also focuses on the importance of communication and empathy, explaining the importance of multi-level communication and emotional openness. The author also touches upon the Enneagram and the DISC system as ways of understanding personality and communication styles. In addition, techniques of externalization, fusion, and defusion, and the principle of the two points are explained. It concludes with an introduction to catartic techniques.
